question: Who has won the 2017 women's singles US Open Tennis tournament?
explanation: Unseeded American Sloane Stephens has won the 2017 womenâ€™s singles US Open tennis tournament after defeating Madison Keys 6-3, 6-0 in the finals at Arthur Ashe Stadium in New York, United States. It is her first grand slam title. With this, Stephens became the second unseeded woman in the Open era to win the US Open after Kim Clijsters in 2009.
